member.name: M:backend.Controllers.AuthController.Register(backend.Models.DTO.RegisterRequestDTO)
member.summary: Registers a new user in the system
member.param: The data needed to register a new user (firstname, lastname, email and password)

member.name: M:backend.Controllers.AuthController.Login(backend.Models.DTO.LoginRequestDTO)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if the username and password are correct
member.param: The credentials needed to log in, including the username (email) and password.

member.name: M:backend.Controllers.ExcursionsController.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all available excursions (now requires authentication and role "User")

member.name: M:backend.Controllers.UsersController.GetProfile
member.summary: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user (must be authenticated using a Bearer token)

member.name: M:backend.Controllers.UsersController.UpdateProfile(backend.Models.DTO.UpdateUserProfileDTO)
member.summary: Updates the profile information of the currently authenticated user (must be authenticated using a Bearer token)
member.param: The updated user profile data, including fields like name, email, and photo (all optionally)
